values: 治疗；治疗疾病；医疗；处理；对待；看待；视为；把…视为；把…看作；招待；款待；请客；讨论；商讨；谈判；论述；陈述；分析；研究；保护；保存
款待；招待；请客；特别款待；享受；乐事；乐趣；精彩的事物；美味佳肴；礼物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重用药物对病人进行治疗。
侧重指治愈伤口、伤痛如灼伤等。
普通用词，指接受并诊治病人。

word_group.brief_definition: 是请吃糖, 还是想遭殃(万圣节时儿童挨家索要糖果用语, 扬言若不给糖就捣乱戏弄别人)
各自付费的聚餐（会），AA制聚餐会
审慎周到（或机智巧妙）地待人处事
word_group.phrase: treat someone or something with kid gloves

word_group.brief_definition: 我请客；我请客了；我作东
特别款待；特殊对待；特别招待

bilingual.source: "I try to treat my passengers how I want my mother treated."
bilingual.target: “我尽量像对待我母亲一样对待我的乘客。”

bilingual.source: "As doctors, we should be responsible for the patients and treat them as our sisters."
bilingual.target: “作为医生，我们应该对病人负责，并像对待姐妹一样对待她们。”

bilingual.source: Why do people treat Henry and the man differently at the hotel?
bilingual.target: 为什么人们在酒店对待亨利和这个男人的方式不同？

bilingual.source: How you treat others is how they will treat you.
bilingual.target: 你如何对待别人，他们就会如何对待你。
始终要尊重地对待他人。
不要肆意对待你的健康。
我们应该公平地对待每个人。

bilingual.source: You can't treat others in this way.
bilingual.target: 你不能如此这般对待别人。
我们需要公平地对待所有人。
我们应该以善良对待他人。

list.abstract: 歌手 ：Treat 歌 曲：42 首 专 辑：4

yingyinNormal.en: What made you treat Farkle the way you did?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要那样对待法尔科？

yingyinNormal.en: But the world is a character in your life, too. And how it treats you has everything to do with how you treat it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是世界也是你生命中的一个角色，你怎样对待世界，世界就怎样对待你。

yingyinNormal.en: I need you to tell him to treat our Health class with dignity and sensitivity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想让你告诉他要带着尊重与敏感之心对待我们的健康课。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no. Now, Freddy, sit down. Do you remember when we talked about how you treat your staff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是走吧。别，弗莱迪，坐下。记得我们谈过你是怎样对待下属的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if I had a company, I'd treat my employees well and make sure we did right by our customers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我有一家公司的话，我会好好对待员工，并且确保为顾客做正确的事。

yingyinNormal.en: I have seen how you treat your friends! We came to you once, starving, homeless, seeking your help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看到过你怎样对待盟友，我们找到你，饥肠辘辘，无家可归，渴求你的帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: If you think for one second that the Capitol will ever treat us fairly, you are lying to yourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你哪怕有一丝期望，认为国会区会公平的对待，我们那你就是在欺骗自己。

yingyinNormal.en: No, someone doesn't treat you the way you deserve, then they don't deserve to have you. My dad always told that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会 如果一个人不好好以你值得拥有的方式对待你，他们也就不配得到你，我爸爸总那么跟我说。

yingyinNormal.en: Trick or treat. Hey. And "treat" it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不给糖就捣蛋。嘿，真是好吃啊！

yingyinNormal.en: What can George's birthday treat be?
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治的生日会有什么特别的地方呢？

yingyinNormal.en: They treat me as well as they're able.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我身边的人待我不太好。

yingyinNormal.en: That's very fine. Do they treat you well?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是不错啊。那里的人对你还不错吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for that. Bedtime should be a treat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢你了啊，现在她们应该会好好睡觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. It's that time in the Twistee Treat, remember?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这是在扭扭冰淇淋店的时候，记得吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And you, as always, provided us with a special treat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以及你，和平时一样，还是拿着那些食物在喂我们。

yingyinNormal.en: Trick or treat! Why are you screaming? You scared us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不给糖就捣蛋。你们叫啥？吓死我们了。

yingyinNormal.en: The family are setting off for George's birthday treat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全家人一起出发去给乔治过生日。

yingyinNormal.en: Right, they are scary. She just ate a treat out of my hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说得对，它们很可怕，它吃掉放在我手上的点心。

yingyinNormal.en: You should ask for candles for a Sunday Treat, not dumb jeans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该要蜡烛作为周日特享的，而不是臭牛仔裤。

yingyinNormal.en: George's birthday treat is a visit to the museum dinosaur room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治特别的生日礼物就是参观博物馆的恐龙。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 款待; 请(客); 乐事

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: behave toward or deal with in a certain way

examination_example.sentence: Similarly, children tend to <highlight>treat</highlight> robots as if they are fellow beings, even when they display only simple social signals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，即使机器人只显示简单的社交信号，孩子们也往往把它们当成同类。

examination_example.sentence: Students are <highlight>treated</highlight> like customers to be pleased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生被当作顾客来取悦。

examination_example.sentence: People continue to <highlight>treat</highlight> fire as an event that needs to be wholly controlled and unleashed only out of necessity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们仍然认为火灾是一种需要完全控制的事件，只有在必要时才会爆发。

examination_example.sentence: Remember to <highlight>treat</highlight> yourself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记得善待自己。

sense_info_list.en: provide someone with at one's own expense
sense_info_list.zh: 款待; 请(客); 乐事

examination_example.sentence: You won't be eating out a lot, but save your pennies and once every few months <highlight>treat</highlight> yourself to a set lunch at a good restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不会经常出去吃，省下钱，每隔几个月请自己去一家好餐馆吃一顿套餐。

sense_info_list.en: present or discuss (a subject); apply a process or a substance to (something) to protect or preserve it or to give it particular properties

examination_example.sentence: California plans to <highlight>treat</highlight> 35, 000 acres of forest a year by 2020, and 60, 000 by 2030.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州计划到2020年每年处理35000英亩森林，到2030年处理60000英亩森林。

sense_info_list.en: give medical care or attention to; try to heal or cure

word_usage.usage:
表示“治疗”
treat指用药物、手术等治疗疾病或创伤
cure指治愈疾病或病人，强调结果
heal指（使）伤口、折断的骨头等愈合，又作 heal up。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 处理; 应对; 讨论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未治疗的；未处理的；未改进的；未改变的
n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: behave toward or deal with in a certain way

examination_example.sentence: They're also less likely to deviate in how they <highlight>treat</highlight> employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对待员工的方式也不太可能出现偏差。

examination_example.sentence: In certain US states, for example, these rights are <highlight>treated</highlight> similarly to property rights, and are transferable to a person's heirs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在美国的某些州，这些权利与财产权类似，可以转让给个人的继承人。

sense_info_list.en: give medical care or attention to; try to heal or cure
provide someone with at one's own expense
deal with or discuss something in a particular way
sense_info_list.zh: 处理; 应对; 讨论

exam_freq_info.chinese: 处理; 应对; 讨论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治
adj. 能治疗的；好对付的；能处理的

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: give medical care or attention to; try to heal or cure

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>treat</highlight> the disorder, there are a number of medicines and therapies that are backed by rigorous research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了治疗这种疾病，有许多药物和疗法都有严格的研究支持。

examination_example.sentence: The lifestyle medicine specialty is designed to train doctors in how to prevent and <highlight>treat</highlight> disease, in part, by changing patients nutritional habits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活方式医学专业旨在培训医生如何在一定程度上通过改变患者的营养习惯来预防和治疗疾病。

sense_info_list.en: behave toward or deal with in a certain way

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>treated</highlight> left-handed children as being disabled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将左撇子儿童视为残疾。

examination_example.sentence: More and more people are <highlight>treating</highlight> pet cats like their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的人把宠物猫当作自己的孩子。

examination_example.sentence: Something each of us can do is to <highlight>treat</highlight> each other with the dignity and sympathy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们每个人都可以做的事情是以尊严和同情对待彼此。

sense_info_list.en: provide someone with at one's own expense
deal with or discuss something in a particular way
sense_info_list.zh: 处理; 应对; 讨论

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: provide someone with at one's own expense

examination_example.sentence: A female cat without children may bring these "<highlight>treats</highlight>" to her owner instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有孩子的母猫可能会把这些“食物”带给她的主人。

examination_example.sentence: He documented his journey as he set about <highlight>treating</highlight> nature as a brand to be marketed to young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他开始将大自然作为一个面向年轻人的品牌来对待时，他记录了自己的旅程。

examination_example.sentence: I respect my mother so much as she never <highlight>treats</highlight> me as a child, but as an equal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我非常尊重我的母亲，因为她从来不把我当孩子，而是把我当做成年人一样对待我。

examination_example.sentence: Assist in <highlight>treating</highlight> a patient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 协助治疗病人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

examination_example.sentence: As they thought about this possibility, they all began to <highlight>treat</highlight> each other with strong respect (尊重).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们想到这种可能性时，他们都开始以强烈的敬意对待彼此。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Treat</highlight> everyone with politeness even those who are very rude to you, not because they are nice, but because you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 礼貌地对待每一个人，即使是那些对你非常粗鲁的人，不是因为他们好，而是因为你好。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>treat</highlight> their pets even better than their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对待宠物甚至比对待自己的孩子更好。

examination_example.sentence: Vaccination is good enough to <highlight>treat</highlight> COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接种疫苗足以治疗新冠肺炎。

examination_example.sentence: Interent is an easy way for doctors to <highlight>treat</highlight> their patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 互联网是医生治疗病人的一种简单方法。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors should change their ways to <highlight>treat</highlight> their patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生应该改变他们治疗病人的方式。

examination_example.sentence: Candied fruit is a <highlight>treat</highlight> that everyone can enjoy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蜜饯是人人都能享用的美食。

examination_example.sentence: For his son’s birthday, Steven is taking him to the new movie as a <highlight>treat</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了庆祝儿子的生日，史蒂文带他去看新电影作为奖励。

examination_example.sentence: In China, when we invite friends or relatives, we always <highlight>treat</highlight> them to a big dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，当我们邀请朋友或亲戚时，我们总是请他们吃一顿大餐。
